00049 // signal handling with MPI jobs is too complicated
00050 
00051 #ifndef MPI
00052 jmp_buf env;
00053 
00054 volatile sig_atomic_t sigterminate;
00055 
00056 void catchterminate(int sig)
00057 {
00058   sigterminate = 1;
00059   fprintf(stderr, "... catched signal - terminate minimization\n");
00060   signal(sig, catchterminate);
00061 }
00062 #endif

00067 static struct {
00068   int log;
00069   const char* logfile;
00070   int maxsteps;
00071   const Interaction* Int;
00072   const Constraint* Const;
00073   int nconst;
00074   Para* q;
00075   Parameterization* P;
00076   SlaterDet* Q;
00077   SlaterDetAux* X;
00078   gradSlaterDetAux* dX;
00079   gradSlaterDet* dH;
00080 } Min;

00084 static void copyxtopara(const double* x, Para* q)
00085 {
00086   int i;
00087   for (i=0; i<q->n; i++)
00088     q->x[i] = x[i];
00089 }

00091 
00092 void MinimizeDONLP2(const Interaction* Int, 
00093                     const Constraint* Const, int nconst,
00094                     Parameterization* P, Para* q,
00095                     int maxsteps, int log, const char* logfile)
00096 {
00097 #ifndef MPI
00098   // handler for INT and TERM signals
00099   signal(SIGINT, catchterminate);
00100   signal(SIGTERM, catchterminate);
00101 #endif
00102 
00103   Min.log = log;
00104   Min.logfile = logfile;
00105   Min.maxsteps = maxsteps;
00106   Min.Int = Int;
00107   Min.Const = Const;
00108   Min.nconst = nconst;
00109   Min.q = q;
00110   Min.P = P;
00111   Min.Q = (SlaterDet*) malloc(sizeof(SlaterDet));
00112   Min.X = (SlaterDetAux*) malloc(sizeof(SlaterDetAux));
00113   Min.dX = (gradSlaterDetAux*) malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDetAux));
00114   Min.dH = (gradSlaterDet*) malloc(sizeof(gradSlaterDet));
00115 
00116   Min.P->ParainitSlaterDet(q, Min.Q);
00117   initSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Min.X);
00118   initgradSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Min.dX);
00119   initgradSlaterDet(Min.Q, Min.dH);
00120 
00121 #ifndef MPI
00122   // regular program execution or catched signal ?
00123   if (!setjmp(env))
00124 #endif
00125     FORTRAN(donlp2)();
00126 
00127   copyxtopara(FORTRAN(o8xdat).x, Min.q);
00128 }

00131 void FORTRAN(ef)(const double* x, double* fx)
00132 {
00133 #ifndef MPI
00134   if (sigterminate)
00135     longjmp(env, 1);
00136 #endif
00137   copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
00138   Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);
00139   calcSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Min.X);
00140 #ifdef MPI
00141   calcHamiltonianmpi(Min.Int, Min.Q, Min.X, fx);
00142 #else
00143   calcHamiltonian(Min.Int, Min.Q, Min.X, fx);
00144 #endif
00145   FORTRAN(o8cnt).icf++;
00146   // fprintf(stderr, "ef:     \tE = %8.3f MeV\n", hbc*(*fx));
00147 }
00148 
00149 
00150 void FORTRAN(egradf)(const double* x, double* gradf)
00151 {
00152 #ifndef MPI
00153   if (sigterminate)
00154     longjmp(env, 1);
00155 #endif
00156   copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
00157   Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);
00158   calcSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Min.X);
00159   calcgradSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Min.X, Min.dX);
00160 #ifdef MPI
00161   calcgradHamiltonianmpi(Min.Int, Min.Q, Min.X, Min.dX, Min.dH);
00162 #else
00163   calcgradHamiltonian(Min.Int, Min.Q, Min.X, Min.dX, Min.dH);
00164 #endif
00165   Min.P->ParaprojectgradSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.dH, gradf);
00166   FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf++;
00167   fprintf(stderr, "step %3d: \tE = %8.3f MeV\n", 
00168           FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf, hbc*creal(Min.dH->val));
00169 
00170   if (Min.log && !(FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf % Min.log)) {
00171     char logfname[255];
00172     sprintf(logfname, "%s.min.%03d.log", Min.logfile, FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf);
00173     FILE* logfp;
00174     if (!(logfp = fopen(logfname, "w"))) {
00175       fprintf(stderr, "couldn't open %s for writing\n", logfname);
00176     } else {
00177       fprintinfo(logfp);
00178       fprintf(logfp, "# step %3d: \tE = %8.3f MeV\n", 
00179               FORTRAN(o8cnt).icgf, hbc*creal(Min.dH->val));
00180       fprintf(logfp, "\n# Parameterization\n");
00181       fprintf(logfp, "<Parameterization %s>\n", Min.P->name);
00182       Min.P->Parawrite(logfp, Min.q);
00183       fprintf(logfp, "\n# SlaterDet\n");
00184       writeSlaterDet(logfp, Min.Q);
00185       fclose(logfp);
00186     }
00187   }   
00188 
00189 }

00192 void FORTRAN(eg)(int* i, const double* x, double* gxi)
00193 {
00194   if (!strcmp(Min.P->name, "FMD")) {
00195     *gxi = x[(*i-1)*NGAUSS+APOS];
00196   }
00197 }

00205 void FORTRAN(eh)(int* i, const double* x, double* hxi)
00206 {
00207 #ifndef MPI
00208   if (sigterminate)
00209     longjmp(env, 1);
00210 #endif
00211   copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
00212   Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);
00213   calcSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Min.X);
00214   
00215   Min.Const[*i-1].me(Min.Q, Min.X, hxi);
00216 
00217   fprintf(stderr, "\t\t\tme   %4s = %8.3f\n", 
00218           Min.Const[*i-1].label, Min.Const[*i-1].output(*hxi));
00219 
00220   *hxi -= Min.Const[*i-1].val;
00221 }
00222 
00223 
00224 void FORTRAN(egradh)(int* i, const double* x, double* gradhi)
00225 {
00226 #ifndef MPI
00227   if (sigterminate)
00228     longjmp(env, 1);
00229 #endif
00230   copyxtopara(x, Min.q);
00231   Min.P->ParatoSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.Q);
00232   calcSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Min.X);
00233   calcgradSlaterDetAux(Min.Q, Min.X, Min.dX);
00234   zerogradSlaterDet(Min.dH);
00235   Min.Const[*i-1].gradme(Min.Q, Min.X, Min.dX, Min.dH);
00236   Min.P->ParaprojectgradSlaterDet(Min.q, Min.dH, gradhi);
00237   fprintf(stderr, "\t\t\tgrad %4s = %8.3f\n", 
00238           Min.Const[*i-1].label, Min.Const[*i-1].output(Min.dH->val));
00239 }

00242 void FORTRAN(setup0)(void)
00243 {
00244   int i;
00245 
00246   FORTRAN(o8dim).n = Min.q->n;
00247   FORTRAN(o8dim).nh = Min.nconst;
00248   // in case of FMD parametrization use bound constraints for Re{a}
00249   if (!strcmp(Min.P->name, "FMD")) {
00250     FORTRAN(o8dim).ng = Min.q->ngauss;
00251     for (i=0; i<Min.nconst+1; i++) {
00252       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i][0] = -1;
00253       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i][1] = 0;
00254       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i][2] = 0;
00255     }
00256     for (i=0; i<Min.q->ngauss; i++) {
00257       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i+Min.nconst+1][0] = 1;
00258       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i+Min.nconst+1][1] = i*NGAUSS+APOS+1;
00259       FORTRAN(o8gri).gunit[i+Min.nconst+1][2] = 1;
00260     }
00261     for (i=0; i<Min.q->ngauss; i++) {
00262       if (Min.q->x[i*NGAUSS+APOS] < 0)
00263         Min.q->x[i*NGAUSS+APOS] = 1.0+1.0*rand()/RAND_MAX;
00264     }
00265   } else
00266     FORTRAN(o8dim).ng = 0;
00267   FORTRAN(o8stpa).analyt = 1;
00268   FORTRAN(o8stpa).cold = 1;
00269   FORTRAN(o8par).tau0 = 10.0;  // 20.0
00270   FORTRAN(o8par).del0 = 0.0;
00271   FORTRAN(o8stpa).silent = 1;
00272 
00273   for (i=0; i<Min.q->n; i++)
00274     FORTRAN(o8xdat).x[i] = Min.q->x[i];
00275 }
00276

00278 void FORTRAN(setup)(void)
00279 {
00280   FORTRAN(o8stpa).te0 = 0;
00281   FORTRAN(o8stpa).te1 = 0;
00282   FORTRAN(o8par).iterma = Min.maxsteps-1;
00283 }
